scripts.build: cd android && gradlew clean && gradlew assembleRelease --stacktrace
scripts.git-fetch: git fetch --all && git reset --hard private/master && git pull
scripts.npm-reset: powershell -NoProfile -Command "try { Stop-Process -Name node -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {}; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 200; if (Test-Path 'node_modules') { cmd /c 'rd /s /q "node_modules"' } ; if (Test-Path 'package-lock.json') { cmd /c 'del /f /q "package-lock.json"' } ; npm install"
scripts.android-reset: powershell -NoProfile -Command "try { Stop-Process -Name java,node,adb -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {}; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 500; if (Test-Path 'node_modules') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'node_modules' }; if (Test-Path 'package-lock.json') { Remove-Item -Force 'package-lock.json' }; if (Test-Path 'android\\.gradle') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'android\\.gradle' }; if (Test-Path 'android\\build') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'android\\build' }; if (Test-Path 'android\\app\\build') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'android\\app\\build' }; if (Test-Path 'android\\.idea') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'android\\.idea' }; if (Test-Path 'android\\.project') { Remove-Item -Force 'android\\.project' }; if (Test-Path 'android\\.classpath') { Remove-Item -Force 'android\\.classpath' }; if (Test-Path 'android\\.settings') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'android\\.settings' }; if (Test-Path '$env:USERPROFILE\\.gradle') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force '$env:USERPROFILE\\.gradle' }; npm install; Write-Host '리셋 완료'"
